sentences.en: Brandname ads are usually splashy or simplistic image ads overover for brand saturation.
sentences.cn: 品牌广告通常是引人注意或是简单的概念,这样的广告反复播出是为了品牌渗入消费者.

sentences.en: She couldn't be her usual splashy , chatty , false self, even on the phone.
sentences.cn: 即便在电话上她都无法成为平日里,那个引人注目 、 说个不停的那个假我.

sentences.en: Then I guess you jet - sitting fancy free bustards need that kind of constancy splashy reassurance.
sentences.cn: 我猜你们这些只知道坐着.时髦.有钱的混蛋们需要那种不变的四处飞溅的休闲.

sentences.en: We dreamed of doing something big and splashy.
sentences.cn: 我们都梦想过做一番大事业。
